languages.language: Responses to the quadrennial reporting by UNESCO Member States on the implementation of the 1974 Recommendation concerning Education for International Understanding, Co-operation and Peace and Education relating to Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms. The next round of reporting is scheduled to take place in 2020. (See methodology section for details of questions asked.)
